title: Seek Stories Not Advice
description: Most advice is too generic to be helpful to you. Rather ask people for their stories and draw your own conclusions.

title: Seek to understand not to control
description: Don't try to control others, rather try to understand them.

title: Teachers, Mentors, and Aristocrats
description: Lessons from Brazilian jiu jitsu about humility, asking for feedback, and the true value of mentors.

title: When being too ambitious is bad for you
description: How scheduling everything to become well-rounded can work against deep obsession and success.

title: Energy Time Money
description: If you aim to optimize for energy, the rest will follow.

title: What I would do differently if I did a PhD again
description: Listen to your inner voice when you think there is a more efficient way to do something.

title: DIY Radio Alarm for Your Mac
description: A step-by-step guide to wake up to your favorite radio station on your Mac using SleepWatcher and Chrome.

title: Gmail: Controlling the day upon which you receive emails from a specific sender
description: How to automatically snooze emails from specific senders until a day of your choosing using Gmail filters and labels.
